data.name: Dungeon Defenders II - Inventory Pack
data.detailed_description:
If you're new to Dungeon Defenders II, this pack is a must-have! Prepare for major looting with an extra Bag and get a head start with extra bag capacity!

  • 1 Extra Bags (a value of 640 gems!)
  • Increased max bag slot from 8 to 9 bags
  • 4 Extra Hero Slots (a value of 1800 gems!)
  • Exclusive "Baggins" Title
  • 400 gems as a special bonus Thank You!
data.about_the_game:
If you're new to Dungeon Defenders II, this pack is a must-have! Prepare for major looting with an extra Bag and get a head start with extra bag capacity!

  • 1 Extra Bags (a value of 640 gems!)
  • Increased max bag slot from 8 to 9 bags
  • 4 Extra Hero Slots (a value of 1800 gems!)
  • Exclusive "Baggins" Title
  • 400 gems as a special bonus Thank You!
data.short_description: Need more bag space? You got it! Loot on, Defender...now you got the space for it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
